tool_description: This document details out the technical integration approach of FUND TRANSFER and merchants. This document refers to the server APIs.
name: Fund Transfer
title: Fund Transfer

api_list.name: ResendOTPFT
api_list.description: In case you miss the otp from our side.

api_list.name: GetBankDetailsFT
api_list.description: By accessing  this API we can get all the bank details of a particular customer. For this a bank code is required.

api_list.name: FindCustomerDetailsFT
api_list.description: This API permits us to  find a particular customer's details. e.g-customer's name, customer's mobile number etc.
